act_dump_ignore_warn: Note: You can ignore any 'warning' displayed during the process.
act_err_arb_early_fw:
Rollback index not found.
This may happen on very early firmware versions.
Please perform an OTA update once and try again.
act_err_dump_mismatch: Dumped file size mismatch for '{part}'. Expected: {expected}B, Got: {actual}B
act_err_dump_size_mismatch: Dumped file size mismatch for '{target}'. Expected: {expected}B, Got: {actual}B
act_err_flash_aborted: [!] Cannot flash. Run XML modification first.
act_err_no_patched_files:
[!] No 'kernelsu_next_patched_*.img' found
    in /sdcard/Download/.
    Did you patch it?
act_err_no_xml_dump: No XML/.x files found for dump.
act_err_part_info_missing: [!] Partition info for '{label}' missing in XMLs.
act_err_pull_failed: [!] Failed to pull the patched file.
act_err_root_fail: [!] Patched boot image not created. Error occurred.
act_err_root_fail_lkm: [!] Patched init_boot image not created. Error occurred.
act_manual_fastboot_hang: [!] Enter Fastboot manually if script hangs.
act_model_mismatch: [!] ERROR: Model '{model}' NOT found in fingerprint.
act_no_output_folders: [*] No output folders. Using existing 'image' files.
act_note_region_code:
Select the country code matching your ROM
for Play Integrity and Widevine to work.
act_place_one_file: Place at least one file in '{dir}':
act_prompt_image:
Copy 'image' folder from Lenovo RSA firmware
         to the main directory.
         (e.g. C:\ProgramData\RSA\Download\...)
act_prompt_patch_app:
[ACTION REQUIRED]
  1. Open the KernelSU Next app.
  2. Select 'Click to install'.
  3. Select 'init_boot.img' from internal storage root.
  4. Let it patch. The new file will be saved
     to your 'Download' folder.
act_prompt_vb_vbmeta:
[STEP 1] Place PRC firmware files (vendor_boot.img, vbmeta.img)
         into '{name}' folder.
act_reset_sent_wait: [+] Reboot command sent. Waiting for boot...
act_root_err_lkm_skip_adb: [!] LKM root with 'Skip ADB' is not supported as it needs the kernel version.
act_root_err_lkm_skip_adb_exc: LKM root requires ADB to get kernel version.
act_root_manual_flash_notice:
[NOTICE] You must manually flash the generated
           images to your device using Fastboot.
act_root_warn_lkm_kver_fail: [!] Warning: Could not get kernel version via ADB: {e}
act_root_warn_lkm_kver_retry: [!] Will attempt to get it later, but this may fail if device is rebooting.
act_safety_remove: [*] Safety: Removing stock devinfo/persist from 'image' folder.
act_slot_adb_fail: [!] ADB slot detection failed. Trying Fastboot...
act_slot_detected_sys: [*] Slot detected. Rebooting to System for EDL prep...
act_unroot_gki_detected: [+] GKI backup (boot.img) detected. Proceeding with GKI unroot.
act_unroot_lkm_detected: [+] LKM backup (init_boot.img, vbmeta.img) detected. Proceeding with LKM unroot.
act_unroot_prompt_all:
[!] No backup boot image found.

    [For LKM Unroot]
    Place 'init_boot.img' and 'vbmeta.img'
    into the '{lkm_dir}' folder.

    [For GKI Unroot]
    Place 'boot.img' into the '{gki_dir}' folder.
act_unroot_req_xmls: [!] Unroot requires partition info from XMLs.
act_warn_devinfo_xml_missing: [!] Warning: '{name}' missing. Cannot create devinfo XML.
act_warn_overwrite_1: WARNING: THIS WILL OVERWRITE FILES IN 'image'
act_warn_persist_xml_missing: [!] Warning: '{name}' missing. Cannot create persist XML.
act_warn_slot_fail: [!] Warning: Slot detection failed. No suffix used.
act_warn_unstable: [!] Failure due to unstable device connection. Manually reset EDL mode and attempt recovery.
act_xml_dump_req: [!] Dump requires partition info from these files.
act_xml_scan_x: [*] No XML files. Checking for .x files...
action_required_details: Move 'LTBox' to a path with only ASCII characters.
critical_err_base_tools: [!] Critical Error: Failed to install base tools: {e}
critical_error_path_encoding: CRITICAL ERROR: NON-ASCII CHARACTERS DETECTED IN PATH
device_already_edl: [+] Device already in EDL. Skipping ADB reboot.
device_cause_2: 2. Driver issue (Check Qualcomm HS-USB QDLoader 9008 in Device Manager).
device_cause_3: 3. Device hung (Hold Power+Vol- for 10s to force reboot).
device_enable_usb_debug: [!] Enable USB Debugging and connect via USB.
device_ensure_connect: [!] Ensure device is connected and authorized.
device_err_model_auth: [!] Failed to get model. Is device authorized?
device_err_tools_missing: [!] Error: Qsaharaserver.exe or fh_loader.exe missing in {dir}.
device_fatal_programmer: [!] FATAL: Failed to load Firehose programmer.
device_manual_edl_fail: [!] Reboot to EDL manually if needed.
device_manual_edl_req: [!] Skip ADB enabled. Reboot to EDL manually.
device_manual_next_steps: [!] (Manual reboot to EDL/System may be required)
device_reboot_edl_sent: [+] Reboot command sent. Waiting for EDL mode...
device_reboot_fastboot_sent: [+] Reboot command sent. Waiting for Fastboot...
device_skip_adb_leave_fastboot: [!] Skip ADB enabled. Device stays in Fastboot.
device_warn_slot_invalid: [!] Warning: Invalid slot suffix '{suffix}'. Assuming non-A/B.
dl_avb_not_found: [!] avbtool or keys missing. Downloading from AOSP...
dl_err_zip_not_found: Failed to find downloaded zip for {tool_name}
dl_gki_download_fail: [!] Failed to download AnyKernel3.zip for kernel {version}.
dl_ksu_exists: [+] KernelSU Next Manager (Spoofed) APK exists. Skipping.
dl_lkm_download_fail: [!] Failed to download {asset}. Ensure a matching kernel module exists on GitHub.
dl_lkm_get_kver: [*] Getting kernel version from device via ADB...
dl_lkm_kver_fail: [!] Failed to parse kernel version from: {ver}
err_arch_unsupported: [!] 32-bit (I386) or ARM64 builds are not supported.
err_ensure_ltbox_present: [!] Ensure the 'ltbox' folder and its files are present.
err_fatal_amd64: [!] Fatal Error: This tool requires a 64-bit (AMD64) Windows environment.
err_fatal_windows: [!] Fatal Error: This tool is designed to run only on Windows.
err_import_critical: [!] Critical Import Error: Failed to import 'ltbox.errors'.
err_lang_dir_not_found: [!] Critical Error: Language directory not found.
err_load_fallback_lang: [!] Failed to load fallback language en.json: {e}
err_load_lang: [!] Failed to load language {lang_code}, using fallback: {e}
err_no_lang_files: [!] Critical Error: No language files (*.json) found in:
img_avb_apply_footer: [*] Applying hash footer for '{name}' with Algorithm={algo}...
img_avb_erase_footer: [*] Erasing any existing footer from '{name}' (pre-signing step)...
img_avb_erase_footer_fail: [*] Note: 'erase_footer' failed, likely because no footer was present. This is expected. ({e})
img_avb_erase_footer_ok: [*] Note: 'erase_footer' complete. Errors are ignored as image may not have a footer.
img_avb_warn_algo_override: [!] Warning: '{name}' algorithm is '{algo}', not 'NONE'. Overriding to NONE.
img_avb_warn_key_fallback: [!] Warning: Original key SHA1 '{key}' not in key_map. Falling back to '{fallback_name}'.
img_err_boot_key_mismatch: [!] boot.img key '{key}' mismatch. Cannot add footer.
img_kv_err_parse: Error: 'Linux version' string missing or unparseable.
img_root_err_img_not_found: [!] Image '{name}' not found in working directory.
img_root_lkm_no_dev: [!] LKM patch requires a device connection (for ADB). Aborting.
img_root_lkm_stub: [*] LKM patch logic not yet implemented. Repacking as-is.
img_verify_boot: [*] Verifying boot image key and metadata...
img_xml_warn_persist_missing: [!] Warning: 'persist' label not found in {name}. Created anyway.
info_drag_files_prompt: [!] Drag and drop .img files or folders.
menu_adv_1: 1. Convert ROW to PRC in ROM
menu_adv_3: 3. Patch devinfo/persist to change country code
menu_adv_7: 7. Write Anti-Anti-Rollback patched image to device
menu_adv_invalid: [!] Invalid choice. Enter a number from 1-12, or m.
menu_lang_invalid: [!] Invalid choice. Enter a number from 1 to {len}.
menu_main_1: 1. Install firmware to PRC device [WIPE DATA]
menu_main_2: 2. Update firmware on PRC device [KEEP DATA]
menu_root_2_lkm: 2. Patch init_boot.img via KernelSU Next App (from 'image' folder)
scan_no_files: [!] No .img files found in provided paths.
task_title_install_nowipe: Update Firmware on PRC Device [KEEP DATA]
task_title_install_wipe: Install Firmware to PRC Device [WIPE DATA]
task_title_patch_devinfo: Patch devinfo/persist for Country Code Change
task_title_root_file_lkm: Root: Patch init_boot.img via App (LKM Mode)
utils_cleaning_warning:
This will remove input/output folders and temp files.
Persisted: 'python3', 'backup', 'tools/dl'.
utils_run_install: Run the main script (e.g., start.bat) to install dependencies.
warn_failed_cleanup_workspace: Warning: Failed to clean up temporary workspace {path}: {e}
warn_set_console_title: [!] Warning: Failed to set console title: {e}
wf_backup_notice:
Original devinfo.img/persist.img with unique device info
  are saved in '{dir}'. Keep them safe.
  If using this tool on multiple devices, note the
  serial number to avoid mixing them up.
wf_err_adb_model: CRITICAL: Failed to get device model via ADB. Aborting.
wf_notice_widevine:
If Widevine shows as L3, reboot once,
  reinstall the streaming app, and check again.
wf_nowipe_mode_start: === [KEEP DATA MODE] Automated Update & Flash Firmware ===
wf_process_complete_info: Device will reboot with patched firmware.
wf_step6_extra_dumps: [*] Scheduled extra dumps for ARB check: {dumps}
wf_step8_use_dumps: [*] Using Dumped Images for ARB Check...
